ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I assure you the necro would win.  I ve watched it with my own eyes.  A lvl 30 necro in unrest one day spanked EVERY person who stepped up to them.. with
ygData.messageBody:
Simon wrote:
>
> From: Simon <simon21@...>
>
> a necro vs a monk would be a great fight but i still think the monk would win. unless on the pvp
> server. because the necro's pets don't work in duels (last i checked) the only server they work
> on is the pvp server. do necro's get root? i don't remember if they do then they could own monks
> but i dont' think they get it.

I assure you the necro would win. I've watched it with my own eyes. A
lvl 30 necro in unrest one day spanked EVERY person who stepped up to
them.. with over half life left after each fight. Monks didn't do very
good at all against the necro. Who needs root when you have fear.
Necros own in pvp. Find out for yourself by fighting one. You'll get
owned. Melee classes don't do so hot in pvp.
